creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN - the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Piano, Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, or Singing / Vocals. Enjoy thousands of songs on your REAL INSTRUMENT!
(supports acoustic and electric instruments)

Yousician is your personal music tutor! The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our curriculum, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step video guides help you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So go grab your guitar, bass or ukulele, go sit at your piano or keyboard, or warm up to sing and start playing now!

Who is Yousician for?
• Singers, Pianists, Guitarists, Bass & Ukulele players
• Complete beginners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

What is included?
• Over 1,500 missions, lessons & exercises, with hundreds of videos, covering all the skills you need: sight reading sheet music, classical and pop songs for Piano, and for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele you’ll learn chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more. Find out if you’re in tune when singing along to your favorite songs!
• Yousician also teaches you music theory and Includes special trainers for each skill & chord.
• A Weekly Challenge, where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide.

How does it work?
• It listens to you sing or play the piano, guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges
__

SELF-LEARNERS,
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar, piano, ukulele or bass right.

PLAY WITH ANY PIANO / GUITAR / BASS / UKULELE / VOCALS
Yousician is played with a real instrument, and requires no additional equipment. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms.
Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries.
Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the largest and fastest growing music educator in the world. We believe musicality can and should be as commonplace as literacy.

Send us your feedback:
Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

Download our free music / instrument tuner app:
Guitar Tuna - the #1 downloaded guitar tuner app worldwide
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ovelin.guitartuna&hl=en
descriptionShort: Learn Guitar, Ukulele, Bass or Singing with 1000s of songs, lessons & exercises

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Yousician 4.8 is here! With this version, we have renamed the Home screen, and it is now called "Songs". This is now the place where you'll find a list of songs to play and where you can start a guided lesson.

This update also includes some bug fixes and performance improvements.

Love the app? Rate us! We would love to hear your feedback <3
Any questions? Visit support.yousician.com and reach out to our support team!

title: Yousician - An Award Winning Music Education App

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Learn guitar, bass, ukulele or singing in just minutes a day. Yousician teaches you to play the fun way, with lessons and exercises from expert music teachers, instant feedback and a huge library of popular songs.

No experience needed—Yousician has singing, ukulele, bass and guitar lessons for beginners and pros. With step-by-step tutorials and real-time feedback, you can always be sure you’re playing right.

Yousician’s lessons are designed by music teachers, so you always learn the right thing at the right time. Step-by-step video tutorials teach techniques to learn to sing or learn guitar, bass and ukulele, plus music theory topics like sight reading sheet music and more.



Explore the song library to discover 1000s of popular songs, compete in weekly challenges, track your progress and stay motivated with daily goals, and most importantly, have fun learning to play!



KEY FEATURES
Lesson plans from music experts: Learn the right skills at the right time
1000s of lessons, exercises and videos: Explore tons of topics for every skill level
Step-by-step video tutorials: Master techniques with easy-to-follow instructions
A huge library of hit songs: Learn to play the songs you love
10 levels of guitar lessons: Learn guitar chords, strumming, melodies, slides, fingerpicking and more
Weekly challenges: Compete with friends or millions of Yousicians to see who plays it best
Real-time feedback: Improve your precision and timing with instant, accurate feedback
Adjustable tempo: Play at your own pace—slow down for practice or speed up for a challenge
Guitar tuner: Easy guitar tuning so you always sound your best (uke and bass, too!)
No cords or cables: Learn how to play on a real instrument, without extra accessories

Learn guitar essentials for both rhythm and lead guitar, like chords, fingerpicking and guitar tabs, and learn bass techniques like triads and riffs. Learn ukulele essentials like ukulele chords and plucking, and learn to sing with singing lessons designed by a professional vocal coach.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
• It listens to you sing or play guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you real-time feedback on your performance
• It teaches you awesome songs and skills with step-by-step tutorials
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges

WHO’S IT FOR?
Anyone who wants to learn how to sing or how to play guitar, ukulele and bass! Our curriculum helps musicians of all levels, from complete beginners to pros, self-learners to students.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe to Premium for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms, and upgrade to Premium+ for unlimited access to licensed songs. Sign up for an annual plan billed in monthly installments, an upfront annual plan or a monthly plan. Prices may vary by country. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless you turn off auto-renew in your Yousician account at yousician.com.

WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
We believe music makes the world a better place. That’s why we want to help you find your musical path, whether you’re just starting out or have years of experience. So grab your guitar, uke or bass and let’s jam!

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com
descriptionShort: Learn guitar, bass, ukulele and singing with lessons from music experts.

We update the app regularly to enhance your musical experience. This update includes small improvements and bug fixes.

Love the app? Rate us! We'd love to hear your feedback <3
Any questions? Visit support.yousician.com and reach out to our support team!

title: Yousician - An Award Winning Music Education App

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN - the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Piano, Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, or Singing / Vocals. Enjoy thousands of songs on your REAL INSTRUMENT!
(supports acoustic and electric instruments)

Yousician is your personal music tutor! The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our curriculum, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step video guides help you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So go grab your guitar, bass or ukulele, go sit at your piano or keyboard, or warm up to sing and start playing now!

Who is Yousician for?
• Singers, Pianists, Guitarists, Bass & Ukulele players
• Complete beginners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

What is included?
• Over 1,500 missions, lessons & exercises, with hundreds of videos, covering all the skills you need: sight reading sheet music, classical and pop songs for Piano, and for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele you’ll learn chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more. Find out if you’re in tune when singing along to your favorite songs!
• Yousician also teaches you music theory and Includes special trainers for each skill & chord.
• A Weekly Challenge, where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide.

How does it work?
• It listens to you sing or play the piano, guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges
__

SELF-LEARNERS,
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar, piano, ukulele or bass right.

PLAY WITH ANY PIANO / GUITAR / BASS / UKULELE / VOCALS
Yousician is played with a real instrument, and requires no additional equipment. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms.
Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries.
Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the largest and fastest growing music educator in the world. We believe musicality can and should be as commonplace as literacy.

Send us your feedback:
Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

Download our free music / instrument tuner app:
Guitar Tuna - the #1 downloaded guitar tuner app worldwide
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ovelin.guitartuna&hl=en
descriptionShort: Learn Guitar, Ukulele, Bass or Singing with 1000s of songs, lessons & exercises

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We update the app regularly to enhance your musical experience. This update includes small improvements and bug fixes.

Love the app? Rate us! We'd love to hear your feedback <3
Any questions? Visit support.yousician.com and reach out to our support team!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update includes an overhaul to the pause menu for all stringed instruments. We are especially excited about the addition of new +/- buttons to control the song speed when using practice mode. You'll no longer need to use the slider to select the right speed!

To learn more about the changes, visit our blog at blog.yousician.com. Don't forget to follow us on Social Media to get the latest news and inspiration for learning to play! Go to Settings > Support and hit those social buttons.

title: Yousician - An Award Winning Music Education App

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Learn to play a musical instrument with the #1 music education platform! Yousician is the most effective app to learn guitar, bass, ukulele or singing through fun, interactive lessons. Follow step-by-step videos and exercises, get instant feedback on your playing and explore a huge library of popular songs.

Designed by music experts and used by millions of musicians worldwide, Yousician helps you learn essential music skills at home—without expensive, time-consuming music lessons. All you need is a mobile device and a real guitar, bass, or ukulele.

Whether you want to play in a band, learn your favorite songs on guitar, or simply have fun getting in touch with your inner musician, you’ll love learning with Yousician.

WHY YOUSICIAN?

🎵 Yousician is fun. Game-like music lessons and exciting challenges help you stay motivated to practice and learn.

🎵 Yousician works. Designed by real music teachers, Yousician has comprehensive lesson plans that make sure you learn the right skills at the right time.

🎵 Learn essential skills. With 1,500+ lessons, exercises and songs to explore, there’s always something new to learn. Learn guitar chords, bass riffs, ukulele chords, or vocal techniques from a real vocal coach!

🎵 Get instant feedback. The app listens to you play or sing and gives feedback in real time, so you learn to master every note.

🎵 Track your progress. Reach daily goals with progress tracking and collect achievements as you get better and better.

🎵 Play your style of music. Learn the songs you love! Whatever music genre you’re into, you’re sure to find your favorites in our song library.

“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass.” - New York Times

LEARN GUITAR, BASS, UKULELE, OR SINGING
Learn guitar skills for both rhythm and lead guitar, like chords, strumming, slides, fingerpicking, guitar tabs and more with guitar lessons. Learn bass techniques like triads and riffs, ukulele essentials like ukulele chords and plucking, and learn to sing with singing lessons designed by a professional vocal coach.

HOW OUR SUBSCRIPTION WORKS
You can learn guitar, bass, ukulele or singing for free with Yousician! If you like it, sign up for Yousician Premium+, which helps you learn even faster with no ads, access to even more amazing songs, and more. You can try Premium+ for free for 7 days.

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
We believe music makes the world a better place. That’s why we want to help you find your musical path, whether you’re just starting out or have years of experience. So grab your guitar, uke or bass and let’s jam!

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

title: Yousician - An Award Winning Music Education App

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN - the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Piano, Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, or Singing / Vocals. Enjoy thousands of songs on your REAL INSTRUMENT!
(supports acoustic and electric instruments)

Yousician is your personal music tutor! The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our curriculum, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step video guides help you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So go grab your guitar, bass or ukulele, go sit at your piano or keyboard, or warm up to sing and start playing now!

Who is Yousician for?
• Singers, Pianists, Guitarists, Bass & Ukulele players
• Complete beginners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

What is included?
• Over 1,500 missions, lessons & exercises, with hundreds of videos, covering all the skills you need: sight reading sheet music, classical and pop songs for Piano, and for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele you’ll learn chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more. Find out if you’re in tune when singing along to your favorite songs!
• Yousician also teaches you music theory and Includes special trainers for each skill & chord.
• A Weekly Challenge, where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide.

How does it work?
• It listens to you sing or play the piano, guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges
__

SELF-LEARNERS,
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar, piano, ukulele or bass right.

PLAY WITH ANY PIANO / GUITAR / BASS / UKULELE / VOCALS
Yousician is played with a real instrument, and requires no additional equipment. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms.
Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries.
Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the largest and fastest growing music educator in the world. We believe musicality can and should be as commonplace as literacy.

Send us your feedback:
Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

Download our free music / instrument tuner app:
Guitar Tuna - the #1 downloaded guitar tuner app worldwide
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ovelin.guitartuna&hl=en
descriptionShort: Learn Guitar, Ukulele, Bass or Singing with 1000s of songs, lessons & exercises

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for using Yousician!

- With this update, we’re bringing Bluetooth support for Android devices. Just connect your headset to Bluetooth, open the app, and start playing.

- We changed how your instrument play time is shown in the Profile tab to make it easier for you to view your progress.

- The Edit profile option got moved to the Profile tab. Tap your profile picture in the top left corner in-app to access it.

- The update also includes minor fixes and performance improvements.

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN - the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Piano, Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, or Singing / Vocals. Enjoy thousands of songs on your REAL INSTRUMENT!
(supports acoustic and electric instruments)

Yousician is your personal music tutor! The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our curriculum, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step video guides help you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So go grab your guitar, bass or ukulele, go sit at your piano or keyboard, or warm up to sing and start playing now!

Who is Yousician for?
• Singers, Pianists, Guitarists, Bass & Ukulele players
• Complete beginners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

What is included?
• Over 1,500 missions, lessons & exercises, with hundreds of videos, covering all the skills you need: sight reading sheet music, classical and pop songs for Piano, and for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele you’ll learn chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more. Find out if you’re in tune when singing along to your favorite songs!
• Yousician also teaches you music theory and Includes special trainers for each skill & chord.
• A Weekly Challenge, where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide.

How does it work?
• It listens to you sing or play the piano, guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges
__

SELF-LEARNERS,
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar, piano, ukulele or bass right.

PLAY WITH ANY PIANO / GUITAR / BASS / UKULELE / VOCALS
Yousician is played with a real instrument, and requires no additional equipment. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms.
Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries.
Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

title: Yousician - Guitar, Ukulele, Bass and Singing

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN - the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Piano, Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, or Singing / Vocals. Enjoy thousands of songs on your REAL INSTRUMENT!
(supports acoustic and electric instruments)

Yousician is your personal music tutor! The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our curriculum, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step video guides help you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So go grab your guitar, bass or ukulele, go sit at your piano or keyboard, or warm up to sing and start playing now!

Who is Yousician for?
• Singers, Pianists, Guitarists, Bass & Ukulele players
• Complete beginners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

What is included?
• Over 1,500 missions, lessons & exercises, with hundreds of videos, covering all the skills you need: sight reading sheet music, classical and pop songs for Piano, and for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele you’ll learn chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more. Find out if you’re in tune when singing along to your favorite songs!
• Yousician also teaches you music theory and Includes special trainers for each skill & chord.
• A Weekly Challenge, where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide.

How does it work?
• It listens to you sing or play the piano, guitar, bass or ukulele
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges
__

SELF-LEARNERS,
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar, piano, ukulele or bass right.

PLAY WITH ANY PIANO / GUITAR / BASS / UKULELE / VOCALS
Yousician is played with a real instrument, and requires no additional equipment. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms.
Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries.
Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the largest and fastest growing music educator in the world. We believe musicality can and should be as commonplace as literacy.

Send us your feedback:
Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

Yousician is your personal music teacher. The app listens to you play and gives instant feedback on your accuracy and timing. Our learning path, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from complete beginners to professionals.

Step-by-step videos guide you through each lesson. Fun gameplay tracks your progress and keeps you motivated to practice and learn. You’ll simply be amazed how fast your skills advance. So grab your guitar or bass, or warm up your voice, and start making music!

WHO IS YOUSICIAN FOR?
• Guitarists, Bass players & Singers
• Complete beginners
• Self-learners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

WHAT’S INCLUDED?
• 10,000+ lessons, exercises and songs by artists you love
• Hundreds of videos covering all the skills you need to learn guitar, bass or singing: sight reading sheet music, guitar chords, strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more
• Tons of music theory and trainers for each skill and chord
• Fun Weekly Challenges where you can compete with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide


HOW DOES THE APP WORK?
• Play your real acoustic or electric instrument — no additional equipment needed
• Yousician listens to you sing or play the guitar or bass
• It gives you instant feedback on your performance
• It takes you through awesome songs and step-by-step tutorials that suit your playing level
• It makes learning fun with rewarding gameplay, lessons and challenges

LEARN GUITAR, BASS & SINGING AT YOUR OWN PACE
Yousician has been developed with the world’s most innovative and experienced music teachers. It is perfectly suited for self-learning or as a supplement to learning with a teacher. With step-by-step tutorials and constant feedback you can always be sure you’re playing your guitar or bass right. The microphone on your phone listens to you play and the app tells you how you're performing. It even works for singing so you’ll never be out of tune during karaoke!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms. Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries. Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the world’s leading platform to learn and play music. With a combined 20 million monthly users across our award-winning apps, we’re on a mission to make musicality as common as literacy.

Check out our other apps:
• GuitarTuna, the #1 tuner app worldwide
• Ukulele by Yousician
• Piano by Yousician

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

• https://yousician.com/terms-of-service

title:

4.98.0

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN is the fast, fun way to learn, play and master the Guitar, Bass or Singing. Discover the musician in you with thousands of songs you can learn to play on your very own INSTRUMENT!

Yousician is your personal music teacher. Pick up your instrument, warm up your voice, and learn with interactive guitar lessons that teach as you play. Yousician listens to you and provides instant feedback, making sure you hit the right chords. Learn how to sing with interactive lessons that instantly correct your pitch and guide you to hitting those high notes. Our learning path, designed by expert music teachers, will help musicians of all levels improve, from beginners to professionals.

Learn at your own pace with step-by-step videos. Learn how to play each chord through fun gameplay that tracks your progress and keeps you motivated. Hop into singing lessons with easy-to-follow instructions that make practicing simple and enjoyable. You’ll simply be amazed at how fast you learn alongside Yousician. So grab your guitar or bass, and prepare those vocal chords. It’s time to make music!

WHO IS YOUSICIAN FOR?
• Guitarists, Bass players & Singers
• Complete beginners
• Self-learners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

YOUSICIAN FEATURES

LEARN GUITAR & BASS SEAMLESSLY
- Learn to play chords and discover guitar tabs for songs with step-by-step tutorials
- Learn sheet music, correct chord finger placement, proper strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more
- Play bass and master your instrument with a fun, virtual music teacher
- Yousician even has a guitar tuner so you can start your lesson off right and join countless musicians

LESSONS FOR EVERY MUSICIAN
- Kickstart your musical journey with an extensive catalog of video lessons
- From bass and guitar to singing lessons – Yousician has you covered
- Get over 10,000 lessons, exercises and songs by artists you love
- Learn chord progressions and music theory for every skill level

UNLEASH THE SINGER IN YOU
- Learn how to sing with interactive lessons that listen as you practice
- Enjoy singing lessons with instant feedback to refine your vocals
- Discover your singing potential with your own virtual vocal coach

A FUN WAY TO LEARN MUSIC
- Yousician’s interactive learning is the perfect way to learn guitar, bass, and how to sing
- Explore fun Weekly Challenges with friends and millions of Yousicians worldwide
- Improve and get ready to perform with gamified learning that makes playing instruments fun

Start your free trial today and experience all we have to offer!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms. Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries. Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the world’s leading platform to learn and play music. With a combined 20 million monthly users across our award-winning apps, we’re on a mission to make musicality as common as literacy.

Check out our other apps:
• GuitarTuna, the #1 guitar tuner app worldwide
• Ukulele by Yousician
• Piano by Yousician

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com

Yousician is your personal music teacher. Tune your strings, warm up your voice, and learn with interactive guitar and singing lessons that teach as you play. Start playing and get instant feedback so you make sure to hit the right chords and notes.

With Yousician you can start learning songs from some of your favorite artists including the all new Billie Collection. Learn your favorite Billie Eilish songs, from “bad guy” and “ocean eyes” to all 10 tracks from Billie’s new album ‘HIT ME HARD AND SOFT.

Our learning path, designed by expert music teachers, will help all musicians improve, from complete beginners to professionals. Jump into step-by-step videos that let you learn at your own pace. Learn how to play each bass and guitar chord through fun gameplay that tracks progress and keeps you motivated. Refine your vocals with a singing app packed with singing lessons that make practicing simple and enjoyable.

So grab your guitar or bass, and prepare those vocal chords. It’s time to make music!

WHO IS YOUSICIAN FOR?
• Guitarists, Bass players & Singers
• Complete beginners
• Self-learners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

YOUSICIAN FEATURES

LEARN GUITAR & BASS SEAMLESSLY
- Learn to play chords and discover guitar tabs for songs with step-by-step tutorials
- Learn sheet music, guitar chord finger placement, proper strumming, melodies, lead, fingerpicking and more
- Play bass and master your instrument with a fun, interactive music teacher
- Yousician even has a guitar tuner so you can start your lesson off right and join countless musicians
- Our gamified learning makes playing instruments fun

LEARN TO SING EASILY
- Our singing app has interactive lessons that listen as you practice
- Refine your vocals in singing lessons with instant feedback
- Learn to sing with expert help and discover your singing potential

LESSONS FOR EVERY MUSICIAN
- From bass and guitar teacher to singing app – Yousician does it all
- Get over 10,000 lessons, exercises and songs by artists you love
- Guitar chord progressions and music theory for every skill level

DISCOVER THE BILLIE COLLECTION
- Explore 25+ songs by Billie Eilish
- Play hit songs like “bad guy” and “ocean eyes”
- Learn all 10 songs from Billie’s new album ‘HIT ME HARD AND SOFT’

Start your free trial today and experience all we have to offer!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms. Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries. Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT YOUSICIAN
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the world’s leading platform to learn and play music. With a combined 20 million monthly users across our award-winning apps, we’re on a mission to make musicality as common as literacy.

Check out our other apps:
• GuitarTuna, the #1 guitar tuner app worldwide
• Ukulele by Yousician
• Piano by Yousician

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com
• https://yousician.com/privacy-notice
• https://yousician.com/terms-of-service
descriptionShort: Learn guitar, bass & singing for beginner musicians. Guitar chords, tuner & more

title:
Yousician: Learn Guitar & Bass
5.6.0

creator: Yousician Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
YOUSICIAN is the fast, fun way to learn how to sing, or play and master the Bass or Guitar. Hit the right notes, master your instruments, or learn how to sing thousands of songs in a fun and easy way!

Make music, warm up your voice, and learn with interactive guitar and singing lessons that teach as you play. Get instant feedback as you learn bass or acoustic guitar.

Yousician helps you learn songs from some of your favourite artists including the all new Billie Collection. Learn your favourite Billie Eilish songs, from “bad guy” and “ocean eyes” to all 10 tracks from Billie’s new album ‘HIT ME HARD AND SOFT.

Our learning path, designed by expert music teachers, will help all musicians improve, from complete beginners to professionals. Step-by-step videos let you learn at your own pace. With gameplay that tracks your progress, learn how to play bass and electric or acoustic guitar. Refine your vocals with a singing app packed with singing lessons that make practicing simple and enjoyable.

Grab your guitar or bass, and prepare those vocal chords. It’s time to make music!

YOUSICIAN IS FOR:
• Electric guitarists
• Acoustic guitarists
• Bass players
• Singers
• Complete beginners
• Self-learners
• Advanced & professional musicians
• Music teachers

YOUSICIAN FEATURES

LEARN GUITAR & BASS
- Playing out of tune? Learn to play chords from guitar tabs & lessons for songs with tutorials
- Learn sheet music, guitar chord finger placement, proper strumming, melodies, fingerpicking and guitar frets
- Guitar tabs are available for your favourite songs to help you dive in and learn famous melodies and guitar riffs
- Your interactive music teacher helps you learn to play bass, master your instrument, and improve your singing tone
- Tuning made easy with Yousician’s in-app guitar or bass tuner
- Gamified learning makes playing instruments fun

LEARN TO BE A SINGER
- Our singing app has interactive lessons that listen as you practice
- Receive instant feedback on your singing tone
- Out of tune? Learn to sing with expert help and discover your potential as a singer

LESSONS FOR EVERY MUSICIAN
- From bass and guitar teacher to singing app – Yousician does it all
- Get over 10,000 lessons, exercises and songs by artists you love
- Guitar chord progressions and music theory for every skill level

DISCOVER THE BILLIE COLLECTION
- Explore 25+ songs by Billie Eilish
- Play hit songs like “bad guy” and “ocean eyes”
- Learn all 10 songs from Billie’s new album ‘HIT ME HARD AND SOFT’

Start your free trial today and make music!

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribe for unlimited and uninterrupted playtime across all platforms. Subscription types are annual plans billed in monthly installments, upfront annual and monthly plans. Prices may vary in different countries. Subscription automatically renews at the end of each term unless auto-renew is turned off in your Yousician account on yousician.com. If you use a Google Play store account, you can cancel your subscription from there.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
“Yousician is modern technology's gift to music education. It’s an app that teaches you to master the guitar instead of a plastic game controller.” - Guitar World

“Yousician is a fabulous place to start learning piano, guitar, ukulele or bass. Yousician teaches basic playing techniques and musical notation by presenting a challenge and then listening as you try to play in real life.” - New York Times

ABOUT YOUSICIAN
Yousician is the world’s leading platform to learn and play music. With a combined 20 million monthly users across our award-winning apps, we’re on a mission to make musicality as common as literacy.

Check out our other apps:
• GuitarTuna, the #1 guitar tuner app worldwide
• Ukulele by Yousician
• Piano by Yousician

Got ideas to make Yousician even better? Simply send your ideas and suggestions to: feedback.yousician.com
• https://yousician.com/privacy-notice
• https://yousician.com/terms-of-service
descriptionShort: Learn guitar, bass & singing this New Year! Guitar tuner, chords, tabs & more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update, we’ve fixed some minor bugs and spent time improving the performance of the app.
Love the app? Rate us! We would love to hear your feedback.
Any questions? Visit support.yousician.com and reach out to our support team!
